SA15pramanvu:2839: nivarttakaḥ sa evātaḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.245 //
SA15pramanvu:2845: tairvinā bhavato 'nyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_4.248 //
SA15pramanvu:2847: sā cenna bhedikā prāptamekarūpamidaṃ jagat // Pramāṇav_4.249 //
SA15pramanvu:2849: ekasya nānārūpatve dve rūpe pāvaketarau // Pramāṇav_4.250 //
SA15pramanvu:2850: tat tasyā jananaṃ rūpamanyasya yadi saiva sā /
SA15pramanvu:2851: na tasyā jananaṃ rūpaṃ tadasyāḥ sambhavet katham // Pramāṇav_4.251 //
SA15pramanvu:2853: tasmāt svadṛṣṭāviva tad dṛṣṭe kārye 'pi gamyate // Pramāṇav_4.252 //
SA15pramanvu:2855: dravaśakteḥ yataḥ kledaḥ sā tvekaiva dvayorapi // Pramāṇav_4.253 //
SA15pramanvu:2859: yenāṃśenādadhad dhūmaṃ tenāṃśena tathā gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_4.255 //
SA15pramanvu:2863: anagnicedadhūmo 'sau sa dhūmaścet sa pāvakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.257 //
SA15pramanvu:2871: vastunyapi tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.262 //
SA15pramanvu:2881: kevalaṃ siddhasādharmyāt smāryate samayaṃ paraḥ // Pramāṇav_4.267 //
SA15pramanvu:2891: anyathā hyanavasthāto bhedaḥ sighyenna kasyacit // Pramāṇav_4.272 //
SA15pramanvu:2902: tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate /
SA15pramanvu:2909: tameva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_4.281 //
SA15pramanvu:2910: ātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddhatmanaḥ sataḥ /
SA15pramanvu:2911: nātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate // Pramāṇav_4.282 //
SA15pramanvu:2913: yathā na kṣepabhāgiṣṭaḥ sa evodbhūtanāśakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.283 //
SA15pramanvu:2915: bhāvo hi sa tathā bhūto 'bhāva bhāvastathā katham // Pramāṇav_4.284 //
